#labels Phase-Deploy,Phase-Implementation
= Configuration =

== SOB Server ==
{{{
ns_section "ns/server/server1/module/dci/server"
    ns_param debug 1
    ns_param retryinterval 1

ns_section "ns/server/server1/module/dci/rpc/server/nsobc:content"
    ns_param http 1

ns_section "ns/server/server1/module/dci/broadcast"
    ns_param debug 1
    ns_param timeoutinterval 2

ns_section "ns/server/server1/module/dci/ncf"
    ns_param debug 1

ns_section "ns/server/server1/module/dci/ncf/clients"
    ns_param fe 127.0.0.1:6000

ns_section "ns/server/server1/module/dci/nfs"
    ns_param debug 1

ns_section "ns/server/server1/module/dci/sob"
    ns_param debug 1

ns_section "ns/server/server1/module/dci/sob/servers"
    ns_param content content

ns_section "ns/server/server1/module/dci/sob/server/content"
    ns_param root "/tmp/sob"
    ns_param mkdirs 1
    ns_param rename 1
    ns_param statsdetail 1

ns_section "ns/server/server1/module/dci/sob/server/content/clients"
    ns_param fe 127.0.0.1:5000
}}}

== Front-end Client ==

{{{
ns_section "ns/server/server1/module/dci/rpc"
    ns_param debug 1
    ns_param port 5000
    ns_param address 127.0.0.1

ns_section "ns/server/server1/module/dci/rpc/client/nsobc:content"
    ns_param httpkeepalive 1
    ns_param host 127.0.0.1
    ns_param httpnumconnections 2

ns_section "ns/server/server1/module/dci/ncf"
    ns_param debug 1
    ns_param client 1

ns_section "ns/server/server1/module/dci/receiver"
    ns_param address 127.0.0.1
    ns_param port 6000

ns_section "ns/server/server1/module/dci/sob"
    ns_param debug 1

ns_section "ns/server/server1/module/dci/sob/clients"
    ns_param content content

ns_section "ns/server/server1/module/dci/sob/client/content"
    ns_param timeout 1
}}}
